channel.title: Spells are the same ID?
channel.description:
On my server (PI), my spells, Alchemy, enchantments, and plank make, are all the same ID, so whenever I use one I'd have to choose one spell to use.
I don't know what's causing this, and I don't think it's server sided because I've been looking through it a lot.

item.title: Spells are the same ID?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Alright, I tried to seperate them but I only managed to find where the plank ID and the other magic IDs were being connected, but now it’s still got the same problem for the enchantments and the alches. I looked through the functions that I could find that had anything to do with the enchantments and they’re all set for the right ID, they just aren’t reading the actual spell ID as what it’s supposed to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Spells are the same ID?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Check to see that they’re being separated in their functions.

Read full topic
